mapper.select: SELECT c.id as id, d.id as doctorId, p.id as patientId, p.fullname as patientFullName, c.start_time as startTime, end_time as endTime, expected_time as expectedTime, status as status FROM patient as p, doctor as d, consultation as c WHERE d.id = c.doctor_id and p.id = c.patient_id and d.username=#{doctorName}
